scripts.dev:schema:drop:all: npm run dev:schema:drop:wallet && npm run dev:schema:drop:app
scripts.dev:schema:migrate:all: npm run dev:schema:migrate:wallet && npm run dev:schema:migrate:app
scripts.dev:schema:migrate:wallet: MYSQL_DATABASE=agency_wallets MYSQL_USER=root MYSQL_PASSWORD=mysecretpassword MYSQL_HOST=localhost MYSQL_PORT=3306 npm run schema:migrate:wallet
scripts.dev:schema:migrate:app: MYSQL_DATABASE=agency_application MYSQL_USER=root MYSQL_PASSWORD=mysecretpassword MYSQL_HOST=localhost MYSQL_PORT=3306 npm run schema:migrate:app
